cleanupReviewsOlderThanThreeMonths.message: Close all review older than 3 months

cleanupReviewsOlderThanThreeMonthsDone.message: All reviews older than 3 months are closed

cleanupUserDetails.message: All active reviews for the user will be closed.

description.message: This extension add some functionalities to Crucible

listInactiveUsersDetails.message: List all users with no reviews at all

onlyForAdmin.message: This panel is only available for admins

settingsFirst.message: Something went wrong, maybe you didn't configure properly the extension, or maybe you are not admin. Please first visit the options page to double check the settings
